name: Lil Junk Bot
description:
Play as Lil Junk Bot in this rogue-like, shoot-em, beat-em up where you fight waves of enemies to scavenge their upgrades. Lil Junk Bot is a lil bit jank though so he sometimes ends up dropping his upgrades after a hard fight. Help Lil Junk Bot collect as many upgrades as possible, if you fall in battle you lose all your progress.

Made for the Game Jobs Live Jam. All assets were made by me and during the Jam. Unity in built packages were used for this project: Cinemachine, URP, TMPro, Probuilder, Input System.

Controls:

+ Move - WASD

+ Shoot - Left Click

+ Melee - Right Click

+ Dash - Space Bar

V1.4

  • Player changes:
    • Player moves slightly faster, dash speed has been compensated to make up for this change.
  • Environment changes:
    • Reduced brightness and increased saturation of the environment so characters on screen are more visible.
  • Bug fixes:
    • Last level can now fully be completed

V1.3

  • Shooting - Changes: Bullets could be fired as fast as the player could hit the shoot button. There is now a cooldown between firing bullets, making the fire rate and bullet speed upgrades more relevant.
  • Explosive Bullet Upgrade  - Bug fixes: The explosion effect now plays properly on all maps. Bullets with the explosion upgrade previously did not disappear when hitting an enemy, they do now.

V1.2 

  • Has the level bugs fixed so they've been re-enabled

V1.1 

  • Has some gamebreaking bugs in the later levels so I've disabled them for now.
